mapper.select: SELECT id_client, first_name, last_name, username, password, email, phone, cell_phone, ville, cote_seller FROM nouvelusage.client where id_client = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client (first_name, last_name, username, password, email, phone, cell_phone, ville, cote_seller) VALUES (#{client.first_name}, #{client.last_name}, #{client.username}, #{client.password}, #{client.email}, #{client.phone}, #{client.cell_phone}, #{client.ville}, #{client.cote_seller});
